connect_wallet_prompt: Connect your wallet to get started.
prestige_balance_message: It is based on your balance of {prestigeBalance} $PRESTIGE.
secret_trophy_desc: Keep playing to unlock this secret trophy.
wallet_prompt: Please open this app in World App.
no_address: Could not get address from World App.
transaction_error: MiniKit did not return a transaction ID.
payment_sent_verifying: Payment sent! Verifying and applying boost...
payment_cancelled: Payment was cancelled or failed in World App.
bulk_buy_prestige_disabled: Bulk buy disabled for Prestige items.
offline_gains_desc: You earned the following amount of tokens while you were away. Claim them now!
offline_gains: You earned {amount} tokens while you were away!

item_details.req_each_autoclicker: Have at least {amount} of each autoclicker.
item_details.eff_add_cps_to_click: Adds {percent}% of your CpS to click value.
item_details.eff_add_cps_from_others: Adds production to {name} based on other autoclickers.
item_details.eff_add_tps: Adds {value} to base production per second.

cursor.name: Cursor
cursor.desc: The beginning of everything. A simple click.

quantumcore.name: Quantum-Core
quantumcore.desc: A quantum core that processes parallel realities.

droneswarm.name: Drone Swarm
droneswarm.desc: Autonomous drones that scour the world for $WCLICK.

serverfarm.name: Server Farm
serverfarm.desc: A massive data center dedicated to mining.

computationalorbital.name: Computational Orbital
computationalorbital.desc: A space station that uses stellar energy to compute.

interdimensionalportal.name: Interdimensional Portal
interdimensionalportal.desc: Opens portals to other dimensions to obtain their riches.

timemachine.name: Time Machine
timemachine.desc: Travels to the future to bring back $WCLICK that hasn't been mined yet.

transcendentsingularity.name: Transcendent Singularity
transcendentsingularity.desc: The final point of computation. It rewrites reality.

devprocessor.name: Dev Processor
devprocessor.desc: Development tool to generate tokens quickly.

thousandFingers.name: Thousand Fingers
thousandFingers.desc: Cursors gain +0.1 for each non-cursor Autoclicker.

millionFingers.name: A Million Fingers
millionFingers.desc: Cursors gain +0.5 for each non-cursor Autoclicker.

assistedClicks.name: Assisted Clicks
assistedClicks.desc: Clicks gain 1% of your total CpS.

exponentialClicks.name: Exponential Clicks
exponentialClicks.desc: Clicks gain an additional 1% of your total CpS.

minerFarmSynergy.name: Miner-Farm Synergy
minerFarmSynergy.desc: Data-Miners gain +1% production for each Server Farm.

portalTimeSynergy.name: Portal-Time Synergy
portalTimeSynergy.desc: Portals gain +1% production for each Time Machine.

tiered_droneswarm.name: Swarm Logistics x{amount}
tiered_droneswarm.desc: Doubles the production of Drone Swarm.

tiered_serverfarm.name: Liquid Cooling x{amount}
tiered_serverfarm.desc: Doubles the production of Server Farm.

tiered_planetarynode.name: Galactic Bandwidth x{amount}
tiered_planetarynode.desc: Doubles the production of Planetary Node.

tiered_computationalorbital.name: Stable Computronium x{amount}
tiered_computationalorbital.desc: Doubles the production of Computational Orbital.

tiered_interdimensionalportal.name: Dimensional Synchronization x{amount}
tiered_interdimensionalportal.desc: Doubles the production of Interdimensional Portal.

tiered_timemachine.name: Stabilized Paradoxes x{amount}
tiered_timemachine.desc: Doubles the production of Time Machine.

tiered_humanitycondenser.name: Collective Consciousness x{amount}
tiered_humanitycondenser.desc: Doubles the production of Humanity Condenser.

tiered_transcendentsingularity.name: Editable Physical Laws x{amount}
tiered_transcendentsingularity.desc: Doubles the production of Transcendent Singularity.

tiered_blackholegenerator.name: Stable Event Horizon x{amount}
tiered_blackholegenerator.desc: Doubles the production of Black Hole Generator.

tiered_realityforge.name: Productive Multiverses x{amount}
tiered_realityforge.desc: Doubles the production of Reality Forge.

diversification.name: Diversification
diversification.desc: Own at least one of each type of autoclicker.

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.desc: Prestige with exactly 1 prestige point to claim.

news: News: Data farms suspected of employing undeclared AI labor.
News: Scientist warns quantum cores are leaking 'too much truth' into information streams.
News: Man robs bank, invests everything in Autoclickers.
News: 'Frankly, this whole $WCLICK thing is a bit suspicious,' says confused idiot.
News: Procrastination epidemic hits nation; experts blame cat videos.
News: $WCLICK value skyrockets after it's rumored to be 'good for the economy.'
News: Humanity verification now more popular than sliced bread, poll finds.
boost_modal.title: How are your earnings calculated?
boost_modal.intro: Your token production is based on several factors that multiply each other:
boost_modal.base_production_desc: The sum of the Tokens per Second (TPS) of all your autoclickers.
boost_modal.upgrades_desc: The upgrades you buy apply multipliers to your autoclickers or your global production.
boost_modal.prestige_boost_desc: Your Prestige Tokens (ERC-20) grant you a global bonus to all your production. It has diminishing returns, so the first ones are the most powerful!
boost_modal.permanent_boost_desc: Bonus purchased from the shop with Humanity Gems.
effect_desc.addCpSToClick: Adds {percent}% of your CpS to your click value.
effect_desc.multiplyAutoclickerByOtherCo: {targetName} effectiveness increased by {value}% for each {sourceName} you own.
effect_desc.addCpSToAutoclickerFromOther: {name}s gain +{value} CpS for each other autoclicker you own.
req.eachAutoclickerAmount: Own at least {amount} of each autoclicker.
